page.title: 14Trade in Barrhead
page.content: { Trade}in Barrhead is mainly through local shops where we are able to buy most things we need. One of the large food chain stores (Fine Fare) is presently building a new{supermarket}in Barrhead.This is good for shoppers but unfortunately may force some small shops to close. We have a small{shopping centre}in Barrhead.It consists of a large food shop,a butcher's,a fruit shop, a chemist,a post office, anewsagent's, a bank,a travel agent,an optician and a few general purpose stores. Many traders in the town are{local people and some businesses have been in the same family for many years. In the last few years some smaller shops have been bought by Asians who live outwith the area.
